name: Mainasutto: I'm not Alone
description:
Mainasutto: I'm not Alone is a metroidvania about time, set on a dark fantasy world, where decision making is crucial for our protagonists to save their timeline.

Story

Time stopped, and people have been living within the same night for years, yet no one remembers the time this happened or the world before this. Occasionally the hands of a mysterious clock appear in the sky, some called it the Doomsday Clock, and no one knows what will happen when the hands return to the beginning.

The Council, who now rules and control what the world can or cannot do, discovered a way to make the hands move, however, there are some individuals who have been able to remember their life before the "incident" and try to stop them since these could be bringing the world to an end, they formed a group of rebels calling themselves Reminiscence.

Both The Council and Reminiscence search for the pieces of a mysterious artifact that seems to have the power to control time if its pieces are put together. You enter here, taking control of Keybold and Ebul members of opposing groups, can you make the right decisions to save the world?

Features Self-Paced Combat

Attack, dash, parry and attack again! or just relax and explore the world and do some side-quest. Level up, learn new skills, meet new friends and enemies, or just go and fight every boss and complete the game as fast as possible. It's your choice!

Explore New Lands

Discover the world where time stops, and explore this cursed vast lands full of different characters! Found over 100 quests, different companions and areas to play while an epic pixel art & chiptune soundtrack follow you during your adventure.

Choose Your Side

Play 2 stories at the same time! Ebul's "Reminiscense" side and Keybold's "Council" side. Rival clans looking for the same but with different visions. Your choices will lead one of the clans to the victory.

Change The Future

Change our destiny and save your friends,  kill your enemies make a choice. Every action matters, every decision you make, every path you take, and every character you met, the future of this world and the length of our story could change. Would you get all the endings?

< Demo 2 will be released on December 2022 >
